name: TheAtlantic
text: "I don’t want to treat our fellow citizens with open contempt, or to confront and berate them. Rather, I am arguing for silence," @RadioFreeTom writes: https://t.co/PMwRGkZIut

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @YasmeenSerhan: Narendra Modi’s government has a track record for dismissing those who protest against its policies as being "anti-national."

I wrote about why this strategy is failing against the farmers' protest:
https://t.co/fWSnk64SGV

name: TheAtlantic
text: In this week's "Dear Therapist," @LoriGottlieb1 advises a reader who is struggling to get through the holiday season after her parents' divorce several years ago. https://t.co/kqDDz2BXO2

name: TheAtlantic
text: Zoom will not make public transit obsolete, @JSadikKhan and @SethSolomonow predict. "In post-pandemic America," they write, "restoring transit will be as essential as restoring power lines, water mains, and roads after a natural or economic disaster." https://t.co/qZaoNH1i5t
